dct_title_s: Cameroons under British Mandate: administered as part of southern provinces of Nigeria, 1938
dct_description_sm: Map shows: international, provincial, Nigeria-Cameroons, divisional, and district boundaries, headquarters provincial and divisional, customs stations, native courts, four classes of roads, railways, telegraph lines,wireless stations,government medical stations, forest reserves. Mandated Territory administered as part of Benue and as part of Adanawa are shown by color coded. Original maps are filed in the Map/Geospatial Center, map reproductions are attached to companion volumes.
